attributes.action: Food Bank Set Up in local Communities
attributes.additional_details:
Please consider the action of setting up Food Banks "collection points "in localised areas  - preferably within walking distance - such as  Churches ,  Community Centres, or similar with Government and/or Local Council funding these Food Banks.

The "collection points" are mainly non-profit organisations and are unable to afford the set up and on-going costs that Food Banks incur.

Running costs include
 *   Food Bank licenses.
     (having the food stored/delivered.)
*    Administration.
*   Volunteers expenses (or wages if appropriate).
*   Utility costs/fuel to keep the buildings open.

The demand for Food Banks are growing at a substantial rate and currently there are not enough "collection points" .
